types:type.name: json
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type json = {| userID: String, loanType: String, balance: String, interestRate: String, gracePeriodEndDate: String, principalBalance: String |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"userID\":\"1\",\"loanType\":\"home\",\"balance\":\"350\",\"interestRate\":\".035\",\"gracePeriodEndDate\":\"2018-09-10\",\"principalBalance\":\"100\"}"}
